My discovery sprint runs in three arcs: align on the opportunity and success metrics, run mixed-method research to map jobs-to-be-done, and validate the riskiest assumptions with prototypes. Engineers join customer research, PMs own API contracts, and everyone sees the same telemetry. That keeps strategy, design, and delivery tightly looped without sacrificing speed.
